$description:
| What does this do? | Ensure DLP policies are enabled for Microsoft Teams |
| Why should you use this? | Prevents accidental sharing of sensitive information in Teams conversations and channels. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users will need to use organizationally approved methods to share sensitive data. |
| Learn more | [DLP Teams default policy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/purview/dlp-teams-default-policy) |
$friendlyName: Baseline - Default DLP Policy for Teams
